definitions.text: turned or twisted toward one side; - G.K.Chesterton
examples: a...youth with a gorgeous red necktie all awry
his wig was, as the British say, skew-whiff
something is wrong with the engine

definitions.text: away from the correct or expected course
examples: something has gone awry in our plans
something went badly amiss in the preparations

definitions.text: turned or twisted to one side
